Overview:
       

Utilities are focused on cost reduction and achieving high levels of productivity more now than ever. Are there business functions or processes that may be better outsourced rather than keeping them in house? How can you determine if outsourcing is the right alternative for your firm?
EUCI’s 4th Conference on Outsourcing for Utilities is designed to help guide energy companies through the key issues necessary to assess before deciding that outsourcing is the right move. Such issues include the decision to outsource, what to outsource, vendor selection, and establishing and maintaining the necessary structure for a successful relationship with that vendor. Hear first hand from presentations and case studies how your peers have made their decisions and the results from their actions.
Attendees of this conference will learn how to:


Leverage technology to drive performance

Choose the right outsourcing model for your company

Initiate win-win contract negotiations

Find new ways to provide high quality service at a low cost

Measure potential risks of outsourcing

Outsource functions traditionally handled by a union

And much more!


Don’t miss this opportunity to learn how outsourcing can impact your business!
Target Audience
You will benefit from attending this conference if you are from the utility industry (gas, electric and diversified, investorowned and independent) with responsibilities or involvement in the following:


Corporate Strategy

Customer Service Management

Billing & Payment Processing Management

Meter-to-Cash Management

Human Resources

Business Process Management

Information Technology Management

Executive Management

Strategic Planning

Finance

Trading


Transmission & Distribution

This conference is a must-attend event for companies and consultants that assist the utility industry in developing and implementing outsourcing agreements and relationships.
